data.actual_result: It jumps you down again to the latest message
data.expected_result: It shouldn't jump you down again
data.short_description: When jumping to a message from search or link and there a store embed close to it, the client scrolls down again
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a store embed in a channel - Let it go up for a while in the channel - Be scrolled down all the way to the bottom of the chat - Search up a message around this embed and try to jump to it and observe how the client instantly jumps back to the latest message again - OR be on the bottom of the channel and search me up mentioning Ene#0808 in BHGC saying "show them" and try to jump to that (there is a store embed a few messages below it)
